Message:
In the town square,
a creature unlike anything
I’d ever seen before
was rampaging.

The familiar sights of my town
were being destroyed
right before my eyes.

But, it all felt like something
out of another world.

People were lashing out
in anger, crying in fear,
and none of it seemed real...

It was like the pages of
a dark fairy tale come to life...

Then, the creature’s howl
split the air of the square,

In that moment,
all those people paralyzed
with fear broke and
ran for their lives.

They trampled
on small children,
shoving anyone in
their way to the ground.

It was exactly the kind of
scene I’d always imagined.

An enemy appears,
and the dashing hero
shows up to...

No. There’s no way
I can do that.

I-I mean,
I’m nothing special...
I’m just a nobody...!
